column1: Do you have something you like which you used to do not like?
column2: 昔は嫌いだったけど今は好きなものある？

column1: Do you like the color green?
Have you ever found a 4 leaf clover?
column2: 四つ葉のクローバー見つけたことある？
大きいものと小さいものどっちが好き？
それは自分のせいだと思う？

column1: Do you think somebody will do it?
column2: 誰かがやってくれるって思う?

column1: Do you have somebody you want to believe?
column2: 信じていたい人がいる

column1: Do you have a plan for the next holiday?
column2: 次の休日の予定は決まってる？

column1: Do you think the weather tomorrow is good?
column2: 明日はいい天気だと思う？
